name: I. M. Pei
alma_mater: Massachusetts Institute of Technology (B.S., Architecture, 1940), Harvard University (M.S., Architecture, 1946)
practice: I. M. Pei & Associates 1955– , I. M. Pei & Partners 1966– , Pei Cobb Freed & Partners 1989– , Pei Partnership Architects(Consultant) 1992–
significant_buildings: John F. Kennedy Library, Boston National Gallery of Art East Building Louvre Pyramid
awards: Royal Gold Medal AIA Gold Medal Presidential Medal of Freedom Pritzker Prize Praemium Imperiale
